Text: Wow, pirating something which was 100% for charity.

@'booobp. - So, you are a pirate and sermonising ? Keep your sermons to yourself. You come here to pirate and refuse to share or upload. Reminds of damn politicians. Pirates are way better than politicians.
Sadly due to bad planning I was a few hours late finding out and donating a few bucks. Wanted to try it anyway so here we are.
Some of us didn't catch the sale. I wasn't home this weekend, and Humble doesn't sell the bundle when its over. I would've bought it had they afforded me the chance.

@booobp I donated. Not all people can. And if it's all 100 % for charity then technically the game is free. So i'm really just distributing free software. Not pirating shit. Get the fuck out if you don't like it

Thank you and BURN IN HELL >:D
No, seriously, thanks, there is no way for me to donate (or pay for anything over internet) so this is the only way I can get this or any other humble bundle
I'm pirating because the Bundle is over and I can't buy anymore. I would love to spent some money for this...
The fists of resistance should be up now, please upload!
Have yet to download this. Waiting for Fists of Resistance :/

Get updated version of Catacomb Snatch at UberSoft Technologies. They call it Uber Catacomb Snatch.

@booobp, et al: Also, Jakob Porser (@JahKob), co-founder of Mojam, says to get a torrent copy. Do a google search for "Jakob Porser twitter bit torrent".
The Broadside Express is a txt file? WTF?
Thanx, I missed the boat completely.
